Warriors’ Wiggins: ‘Only options were to get vaccinated or not be in the NBA’

Golden State Warriors forward Andrew Wiggins spoke at length Monday night about his decision to finally get vaccinated. Still concerned about the long-term effects it might have on him, Wiggins said he did so to keep his job.

UCSF scientists made a woman’s severe depression disappear. Here's how

A woman with severe, treatment-resistant depression has been nearly symptom-free for a year after a team of UCSF scientists implanted a device in her brain that senses when she’s having depressive thoughts or impulses and interrupts them with a burst of electrical stimulation.
